title: godoc double-escapes html search snippets
body:
by **consalus**: 
Visible on golang.org

See http://golang.org/search?q=Dial#Global_pkg/net/

The comment for net.Dial renders with lots of """, because the
"&" is escaped to "&" instead of being left as a raw
"&".
This can be seen with anything snippet that has a quote.
